data.title: Bass Brothers Productions Inc.
data.meta_description: Bass Brothers Productions Inc. | 28 followers on LinkedIn. Bass TV is a video production company located in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.  With over 10 years serving South Florida, Bass TV canvases all outdoor sports, travel and tourism video / film projects as well as creative endevors such as the upcoming action/adventure series "The Bass Brothers in the Million Dollar Bass Hunt".
data.text:
